name: Type font Cuff Bracelet: Huxley Vertical
description:
Long ago and far away before computers, type was hand specified, set, and pasted up on artboards. (Can you imagine?) Designers referred to type books for font and size selection. 

This bracelet was handcrafted using a page from those books to create beautiful wearable art, and capturing a piece of history. Each one is unique. 

• 5.75” x 1.75" – adjusts to fit most wrists 
• Brass base (alloy of zinc and copper)
• Finished with a hypoallergenic gloss coating for protection

Please treat with the same care given any fine piece of jewelry. Avoid perfumes, chemicals, or harsh treatment. Any irregularities or natural patina occurring over time will add to the natural charm of the piece.

name: Graphic Cuff Bracelet: BREATHE
description:
Handcrafted "BREATHE" bracelet in beautiful typographic Onyx font. 
A perfect complement to your black and white wardrobe. Type that thinks it's a graphic - readable only on close inspection – piquing curiosities and sure to trigger conversation.

• 5.75” x 1.75" – adjusts to fit most wrists 
• Brass base (high quality alloy of zinc and copper)
• Hypoallergenic gloss coating for protection

Please treat with the same care given any fine piece of jewelry. Avoid perfumes, chemicals, or harsh treatment. Any irregularities or natural patina occurring over time will add to the natural charm of the piece.

name: Custom Cuff Bracelet
description:
It's YOUR call - customize with a favorite mantra, word, sentiment.... we'll design and fabricate it and send you a proof.  

Wow - what a great gift!
 
In striking black and white - right in line with this Fall's color palette. 

• 5.75” x 1.75" – adjusts to fit most wrists

• Finished with a hypoallergenic coating for protection

Please treat with the same care given any fine piece of jewelry. Avoid perfumes, chemicals, or harsh treatment. Any irregularities or natural patina occurring over time will add to the natural charm of the piece.
